name: Legendary Beast Lairs
description: Homes of powerful magical creatures create dangerous environments with potential treasures and magical materials. The powerful creatures provide ultimate challenges and valuable materials, while the extreme danger makes survival nearly impossible.
atmosphere: Massive claw marks score stone walls while the air carries ancient magic and predator musk. Precious treasures and magical materials are scattered throughout the lair alongside the bones of previous challengers. Deep growls echo from hidden chambers. Territory of creatures beyond mortal understanding.
